subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. is asking the presidents and chancellors of Division III universities, already the association’s largest membership group, about the feasibility of splitting the division or creating a new Division IV. Surveys were mailed Thursday to the 440 Division III members.Division III already is projected to grow to 480 members in the next 12 years. The N.C.A.A. last year formed a working group on membership issues, and the Division III group recommended the creation of a fourth division for the association’s smallest institutions.
